definition[0]: someone’s stewardship of something is the way that they control or protect it
example[0]: Some critics have doubts about his stewardship of the nation.
example[1]: The farm was quite a different place under Mom’s stewardship.
definition[1]: the way in which someone controls and takes care of an organization or event
example[2]: He said that the firm, under the stewardship of his assistants, would suffer no disruptions.
